aggregates.max: Max - The maximum value recorded during a time interval. A higher maximum value could have occurred without it being recorded.
aggregates.average: Avg - The average of values recorded during a time interval.
aggregates.total: Total - Sum of the values recorded for each node during a time interval.
aggregates.min: Min - The minimal value recorded during a time interval. A lower minimal value could have occurred without it being recorded.

native-graph-request-latencies.description: The min, median, max, 90th, and 99th percentile of request transversal latencies during the period.
native-graph-request-latencies.label: Datastax Graph: Request Latencies
native-graph-request-latencies.max: Max - Maximum transversal latency for a request against this graph during the period.
native-graph-request-latencies.median: Median - 50 percent of requests against this graph during the period had a shorter latency.
native-graph-request-latencies.min: Min - Minimum latency for a request against this graph during the period.
native-graph-request-latencies.p90th: 90th - 90 percent of requests against this graph during the period had a shorter latency.
native-graph-request-latencies.p99th: 99th - 99 percent of requests against this graph during the period had a shorter latency.

native-graph-traversals.description: The number of aliased traverals that have been run against the graph.
native-graph-traversals.label: Datastax Graph: Submitted Traversals

native-graph-total-latency.description: The sum of all latency during traversals of the graph.
native-graph-total-latency.label: Datastax Graph: Total Latency

native-all-graph-request-latencies.description: The min, median, max, 90th, and 99th percentile of request transversal latencies during the period.
native-all-graph-request-latencies.label: Datastax Graph: Request Latencies ALL
native-all-graph-request-latencies.max: Max - Maximum transversal latency for a request against this graph during the period.
native-all-graph-request-latencies.median: Median - 50 percent of requests against this graph during the period had a shorter latency.
native-all-graph-request-latencies.min: Min - Minimum latency for a request against this graph during the period.
native-all-graph-request-latencies.p90th: 90th - 90 percent of requests against this graph during the period had a shorter latency.
native-all-graph-request-latencies.p99th: 99th - 99 percent of requests against this graph during the period had a shorter latency.

native-all-graph-traversals.description: The number of aliased traversals that have been run against the graph.
native-all-graph-traversals.label: Datastax Graph: Submitted Traversals ALL

native-all-graph-total-latency.description: The sum of all latency during traversals of graphs.
native-all-graph-total-latency.label: Datastax Graph: Total Latency ALL

native-all-graph-unaliased-request-laten.description: The min, median, max, 90th, and 99th percentile of request transversal latencies during the period.
native-all-graph-unaliased-request-laten.label: Datastax Graph: Unaliased Request Latencies ALL
native-all-graph-unaliased-request-laten.max: Max - Maximum transversal latency for a request against this graph during the period.
native-all-graph-unaliased-request-laten.median: Median - 50 percent of requests against this graph during the period had a shorter latency.
native-all-graph-unaliased-request-laten.min: Min - Minimum latency for a request against this graph during the period.
native-all-graph-unaliased-request-laten.p90th: 90th - 90 percent of requests against this graph during the period had a shorter latency.
native-all-graph-unaliased-request-laten.p99th: 99th - 99 percent of requests against this graph during the period had a shorter latency.

native-all-graph-unaliased-total-latency.description: The sum of all latency during unaliased traversals of graphs.
native-all-graph-unaliased-total-latency.label: Datastax Graph: Unaliased Total Latency ALL

native-all-graph-unaliased-traversals.description: The number of unaliased traverals that have been run against the graph
native-all-graph-unaliased-traversals.label: Datastax Graph: Unaliased Submitted Traversals ALL

all-pending.description: Aggregate of thread pools pending queues that can be used to identify where things are backing up internally. This doesn't include pending compactions because it includes an estimate outside of the task queue or the hinted hand off queue, which can be in constant state of being on.
all-pending.label: Task Queues
